text: It would be great if the Preview “tab” in the page editor, when you select a contact to preview as, that the sharable preview would open previewing as that person. I have to debug a problem with a form loaded via smart content and the preview does not retain the contact’s info so I can’t see the form. Meaning I have to inspect within the page editor to debug, navigating around all the page editor’s html and styles
Workaround in the mean time is to open up your request tab in chrome tools and see the `/_hcms/preview` request made when changing the contact and use that instead
hahaha nice just tried it, thanks Matt!
I noticed in the URL you guys are popping in a `&cacheBust=[random number]` :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye: I’d like to think us devs might have inspired that solution lol
That’s been there for a loooong time
